EmailTemplate.name: 1.6.4 Back-up Offer, training and necessary info request
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Your assessment with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for coming to your assessment with The Challenge. We were very impressed by your performance and are pleased to tell you that you achieved the standard of the {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c} role.
Unfortunately, there are currently no available slots for that role this summer, so we would like to place you on the back-up staff list and invite you to one-day back-up training. This means we cannot guarantee you a job offer, but we will contact you as and when staff withdraw from or become otherwise unavailable for the role. Last year, almost all candidates on the back-up staff list were offered a full role later in the summer.
Please click on the button below to complete this process.
ESSENTIAL INFO FORM: http://thechallenge.force.com/AvailableDates/OnlineUpdateJobApplication?jaid={!Job_Application__c.Id}
TRAINING
Please confirm your attendance at your training session and select your available dates as soon as possible to confirm that you would like to accept this offer.
Please click on the button below to register for the training session in your region.
During training, you will learn all you need to know about The Challenge and your role.
If you cannot access either of the links above for any reason, please call me on the number below.
Once this process is complete we will notify you.
Congratulations on your success and we look forward to working with you on The Challenge.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
CR 1.6.4
